Contributing¶

Contributions¶

Please report any bugs, issues or feature requests here: https://github.com/plone/plone.app.event/issues.

And better yet, help out with documentation and pull-requests!

Note

To accept your pull requests, we need you need to have Plone contributors agreement signed and sent-in. For more information, see: `http://plone.org/foundation/contributors-agreement/contributors-agreement-explained`_.

Contributors¶

Contributors, please add you name here! By doing this, you also state, that you have signed the Plone Contributors Agreement. Download it from plone.org. Thanks!

Find out who contributed:

$ git shortlog -s -e
